definition: to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to

sentences.english: Around 4-6% of elderly people have experienced some form of maltreatment at home.
sentences.chinese: 約有4%到6%的老人在家中受到某種形式的虐待。

sentences.english: Do you think that your mother and I are maltreating you?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲我和你繼母在虐待你？

sentences.english: Why did he let them suffer such cruel hardships?
sentences.chinese: 祂爲何容讓他們飽受如此殘酷的虐待？

sentences.english: The judge said that nothing could mitigate the cruelty with which the mother had treated her child.
sentences.chinese: 法官說，這位母親虐待孩子，罪行無法減輕。

sentences.english: Though brutally mistreated, slaves were not cheap.
sentences.chinese: 雖然遭受殘酷虐待，黑奴並不便宜。

sentences.english: Others say only if they cheat, or abuse you.
sentences.chinese: 另外一些人說除非欺騙或者虐待，否則不離開。

sentences.english: But imagine the transition for a sadist.
sentences.chinese: 但是，請想像一個虐待狂的過渡。

sentences.english: Is this the maltreatment of children?
Not so long ago Japanese wives put up with any amount of infidelity and abuse.
sentences.chinese: 在不久前，日本的妻子們還忍受着各種背叛和虐待。

sentences.english: Aisha fled to escape beatings and other abuse.
sentences.chinese: 阿伊莎想要逃離暴力和虐待。

sentences.english: And when Sarai afflicted her, she ran away.
sentences.chinese: 於是撒辣依就虐待她，她便由撒辣依面前逃跑了。

sentences.english: His dotage simply made him more sadistic.
sentences.chinese: 再加上年老糊塗，他就更是個虐待狂了。

sentences.english: The little penguin was born last month - and was instantly ill-treated by its parents.
sentences.chinese: 這隻小企鵝是在上個月出生的，剛落地就遭父母虐待。

sentences.english: As for the sadist this identification only appears on the stage.
sentences.chinese: 至於虐待狂，這個認同只是出現在舞臺上。

sentences.english: She'sbeen told that her husband is being harshly treated in prison.
sentences.chinese: 她被告知自己的丈夫正在監獄裏遭受虐待。

sentences.english: My father abused us for years.

definition: to torment/to abuse (an animal, child etc)
to beat up/to come to blows/battery (law)
